files.content:
#!/bin/bash
# <bitbar.title>Alternate Options Tutorial</bitbar.title>
# <bitbar.version>v1.0</bitbar.version>
# <bitbar.author>Mat Ryer</bitbar.author>
# <bitbar.author.github>matryer</bitbar.author.github>
# <bitbar.image>http://i.imgur.com/EDYR52G.png</bitbar.image>
# <bitbar.desc>Example of how to include alternate items that replace the one before it when the Option key is pressed.</bitbar.desc>
echo "Hello"
echo "Option key is pressed | alternate=true"

echo "Another"

plugin.title: Alternate Options Tutorial
plugin.author: Mat Ryer

authors.name: Mat Ryer
authors.bio: Building pace.dev and firesearch.dev - Gopher, developer, speaker, author (Go Programming Blueprints) - BitBar app getbitbar.com - Co-creator Gopherize.me

plugin.desc: Example of how to include alternate items that replace the one before it when the Option key is pressed.
